name: Attraction Force: A Co-Op Magnitism Puzzle Game
name_original: Attraction Force: A Co-Op Magnitism Puzzle Game
description:
Attraction Force: A Co-Op Magnetism Puzzle Game

Attraction Force is a coop puzzle game, starring three unique levels with state of the art magnet physics simulation, and masterful UI design hand picked by us ;)

Controls:

White Bean W/Space - Jump

A - Move Left

 D - Move Right

F - Toggle Magnetism To Other Bean

 Purple Bean

Up Arrow - Jump

 Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Right Ctrl - Toggle Magnetise To Other Bean

Credits

Devs: Alex, William, Linyx

 "Good" Time Management - The Above Three

Level Design - Linyx

 UI - Alex

 Technical Direction - William

Lost Their Mind - All of us.
